perturbation.original_text: Each of the parties shall execute and perform this Agreement in compliance with all applicable laws or regulations. Notwithstanding the foregoing, a party shall not be obligated to take any action that violates, infringes or conflicts with or prohibited from taking any action required to be in compliance with any applicable laws or regulations.
perturbation.changed_text: Each of the parties shall execute and perform this Agreement in compliance with some applicable laws or regulations. Notwithstanding the foregoing, a party shall not be obligated to take any action unless required to.
perturbation.explanation: This modification omits the requirement for full compliance with 'all applicable laws', weakening the commitment to legal standards. It introduces ambiguity and potential non-compliance, contradicting laws mandating full adherence to legal and regulatory standards.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General violation of laws and regulations requiring full compliance in contractual agreements.
